short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage information about web pages that I've already seen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that lets users use the OpenAI LLM to gather and save insights about pages that they've visited.

This can be used without the AI component as a simple bookmarker, but for full value, you must have an OpenAPI API key.

One great thing about VuAgain is that all of your notes are private.  We don't save anything. We don't even _have_ a server. (How do we do this magic?  This extensions creates a Google Sheet, owned by you and only readable by you, that saves your notes privately)

One not so great thing about VuAgain is that this code is very new. You may find bugs.  If you do, I apologize. Please report them, and I'll try to fix ASAP.
